definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: And a U.N. peacekeeping force called for in the Djibouti accord has yet to be formed.
sentences.chinese: 吉布提协议中要求部署的联合国维和部队还没有组成。

sentences.english: Djibouti is suffering from four consecutive years of failed rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 吉布提正在经历连续四年的降雨不足。

sentences.english: A new railway is planned from Djibouti to Addis.
sentences.chinese: 一条新的铁路运线将在吉布提到艾缔思。

sentences.english: The Bank is preparing two rapid response operations in Djibouti and Yemen.
sentences.chinese: 世行正在吉布提和也门准备两个快速反应业务。

sentences.english: Little wonder Djibouti has become an important outpost for the U.S. and French military.
sentences.chinese: 难怪吉布提会成为美法两国军事输出的要塞。

definition: Gwadar Port on Arabian Sea in Pakistani province of Baluchistan
Gwadar, free trade port city in Pakistani province of Baluchistan
variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
